function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High concentration of virus-laden aerosols near patients and downstream from patients","Impact":"Increased risk of infection for medical staff and close contacts","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation and air filtration systems, use of personal protective equipment (PPE)","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, UV-C germicidal lamps","People":"Medical staff, close contacts","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"SARS-CoV-2 aerosol distribution indicates a potential transmission distance of 4m","Impact":"Increased risk of long-range transmission in the built environment","Mitigation":"Implement physical distancing measures, limit occupancy, improve ventilation","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, air quality sensors","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Greater contamination of ICU environment compared to general wards","Impact":"Higher infection risk for medical staff working in the ICU","Mitigation":"Stricter protective measures, enhanced cleaning and disinfection protocols","Technologies":"Automated disinfection systems, antimicrobial surface coatings","People":"Medical staff","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"}]}
